subject: Science
title: The Four Seasons
learningObjectives: Identify the four seasons: Spring, Summer, Autumn (Fall), and Winter.
Describe basic characteristics of each season (weather, clothing, activities).
Understand that seasons change in a cycle.

content.body: There are four seasons in a year: spring, summer, autumn, and winter. Each season is special!

content.alt: Four icons representing the four seasons: a flower for spring, a sun for summer, a leaf for autumn, and a snowflake for winter.

content.body: In the spring, flowers bloom. In the summer, it's hot. In the autumn, leaves fall. In the winter, it's cold.

questions.question: In which season do leaves fall from the trees?
What season is hot and sunny?

content.body: Hay cuatro estaciones en un año: primavera, verano, otoño e invierno. ¡Cada estación es especial!

questions.question: ¿En qué estación se caen las hojas de los árboles?
